Casasnovas, José A
León, Montserrat
metadata.dc:description: Young and old patients with acute myocardial infarction have different risk factor profiles, clinical presentation, angiographic findings and prognosis. In the present study we investigated the clinical profile of patients aged <46 years with acute myocardial infarction.
metadata.dc:title: Factores de riesgo cardiovascular y estilo de vida asociados a la aparición prematura de infarto agudo de miocardio.
[Cardiovascular risk factors and lifestyle associated with premature myocardial infarction diagnosis].
